'''Rime-Worn Fragments''' are limited items that only exist during the duration of the event "[[The Chalk Prince and the Dragon]]". It is dropped by common enemies in Dragonspine such as [[Hilichurls]] and [[Treasure Hoarders]]. It has no use, other than being a challenge objective to collect a certain amount of these fragments in the event.
{{See also|Rime-Worn Crystal}}
